changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.event ( event_id bigserial PRIMARY KEY, basic_info_id bigserial, duration_id bigserial, additional_information_id bigserial, web_widget_id bigserial, FOREIGN KEY (basic_info_id) REFERENCES event_basic_information (basic_information_id), FOREIGN KEY (duration_id) REFERENCES event_duration (duration_id), FOREIGN KEY (additional_information_id) REFERENCES event_additional_information (additional_id), FOREIGN KEY (web_widget_id) REFERENCES event_web_widget (widget_id) )
